If-else block.description: Evaluates if a condition is true or false.

If-else-if block.description: Evaluates if a certain condition is true, otherwise it evaluates another one.

loop.description: Executes a block of code repeatedly as long as the condition is true.

loop-labeled.description: Executes a labeled loop, allowing for breaking out of the loop with the label.

loops-labeled-nested.description: Executes nested labeled loops, allowing for breaking out of specific loops using their labels.

while.description: Executes a block of code repeatedly as long as the condition is true.

while-labeled.description: Executes a block of code repeatedly as long as the condition is true.
